summary: The Super Nintendo, or SNES, is a popular video game console from the 1990s. It was made by Nintendo and offered better graphics and sound than its competitors. The system was released in different regions with various names, like Super Famicom in Japan. Despite facing tough competition, especially from Sega's Genesis, the SNES became the top-selling 16-bit console. It sold nearly 50 million units worldwide and remains beloved by retro gamers today, with many still collecting and playing its games.
title: Super Nintendo Entertainment System
